Valentine's day update!
Spring and Easter update

Dear fans,

Today, on the 1st of May we celebrate the anniversary of Wormate.io! We celebrate the 5th Birthday of our favorite game!

For all five years we are doing our best to deliver a stable game play, fresh updates and a lot of fun to all of you.
During These years we hit more than 11 million of registered players all over the world.
More than 53 million of unique visitors on our website.
And more than 18 million installations on different mobile devices in total.

Those were 5 incredible years of a sincere joy of developing the game for you guys.
But we are not stopping, and we continue to refactor and improve the game continuously.
We are aware of the glitches that some of you have on their phones, and we are concerned about it.
Right now we are developing the new and fast gaming protocol, the ultimate solution to reduce the glitches as good as we can.
We also plan to deliver a couple of new game modes soon.

Thank you for staying with us, and remember: the best is yet to be released.

Sincerely yours, Wormate.io team (yeah, the two of us).

This release is dedicated to the 30th anniversary of Ukraine's independence.
